name: Vernum Cuspide
description:
Vernum Cuspide is a game written for the Spring UE4 Game jam by 1 person (me) in 5 days.  

There is no sound, your speakers are fine.  It's also not the prettiest on the planet, but it does work.  If you get lost, click "Help" in the Main Menu.  

The NPCs chat using an ELIZA-esque string pattern matching system I built.  It's kinda clever, but the NPCs are not well "read" so to speak (they don't know a lot).   Sorry about that.
**Just a warning to you all, I goofed and set the initial player values for health very, very low.  You will probably die when you try to do any combat.  I'll get a hotfix up after it's over.  Apologies in advance, but at least the NPC AI Chat works....
